alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:14PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Greeley, western Nance, northwestern Merrick and Howard Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 414 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elba to near Cushing to 7 miles southwest of Fullerton. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Palmer around 430 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Dannebrog and Archer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
